title: Font from "The Germans" Magazine
content:
Hello everyone !

Does anyone know what is the font used in the new german magazine "The Germans" ?

Here's a sample from the magazine website ( [http://www.thegermansmagazine.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011074025/http:/www.thegermansmagazine.com/ "http://www.thegermansmagazine.com/"))

Thank you !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Capture d’écran 2013-03-06 à 00.33.18.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011074025/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture%20d%E2%80%99%C3%A9cran%202013-03-06%20%C3%A0%2000.33.18.png) | 78.21 KB |
author: gipnus

comments.content: Oh, I found it ! It's Fortescue by foundry Colophon.
